Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hsa.games.fatsquirrel.Core.Entity.Entity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BadBeast, BadPlant, GoodBeast, GoodPlant, MiniSquirrel, Squirrel, Wall

    public abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages all Entities

      • getRounds

        protected int getRounds()
        Get the Current Rounds. The Rounds define if the Entity is allowed to move or not If Rounds = 0 it is allowed to move
        Returns:
        Rounds as Int

      • setTimeOut

        Parameters:
        rounds - The Int amount of Rounds
